items.name: Action King
items.desc:
Action King / DIPA / 4 x 440ml / 8.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
This absolute unit; this Cadillac of DIPAs; this liquid training montage is hopped with Galaxy, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe until it bursts out of its tank top. Expect mango, pineapple, pomegranate and a big whack of dankness.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: BEER & CHARCUTERIE TASTING EVENT PACK [delivery included]
items.desc:
HOWLING HOPS x CROWN & QUEUE
BEER & CHARCUTERIE TASTING EVENT PACK [with FREE DELIVERY]
We’re holding a live beer and charcuterie pairing event with Crown & Queue Meats, on Instagram Live on November 5th at 8pm! You can join in by ordering this Beer & Charcuterie Tasting Event Pack and watching live! These will be limited to 48 packs in total, so don’t delay on getting one!
We’re going to record the tasting on Instagram Live at All Good Beer in Hackney Downs. The Tasting Event Pack will have FOUR Beer and Charcuterie pairings that we’ll be tasting together, with the help of Crown & Queue!
1x Pocketbook DDH Pale 440ml + Hoghton Loin
1x Passing By DDH Red Ale 440ml + Lincoln Imp Sausage
1x Freedom Vortex West Coast IPA 440ml + Black Pepper Belly
1x Soft Top Sabro Stout 440ml + Martlemass Beef
As well as the four cans of pairing beers, you’ll also receive 2 x Tropical Deluxe and 2 x House IPA, along with tasting notes and other goodies! We’ll also be giving away some prizes on the night!
After you’ve ordered your box, we’ll be in touch ahead of the event with a notice of shipping and an event reminder. Cheers!
[*PLEASE NOTE* If you order any additional products with this pre-order, they will not be shipped before w/c 2nd November unless they also grant free shipping. Thanks.]

items.name: Buckle Down
items.desc:
Buckle Down / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.0% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
A DDH Pale Ale dry hopped with Citra, Amarillo and Columbus. Flexing fruity sherbet and superfresh dankness above its 5% ABV. Keep on keeping on with this juicy treat.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Freedom Vortex
items.desc:
Freedom Vortex / West Coast IPA / 4 x 440ml / 7.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Citra, Centennial and Columbus (name a more iconic trio we’ll wait) join forces for the Westie comeback tour. West Coast IPA just like mama used to make: blood orange, pine and grapefruit for days, with IBUs and whatnot.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: House IPA
items.desc:
House IPA / India Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 6.9% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Passing By
items.desc:
Passing By / DDH Red Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.7% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
A DDH Red Ale dry hopped with Citra, Centennial and Columbus. All the juicy hop goodness of an IPA but with a lovely, biscuity, caramel roundness.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Rooftops
items.desc:
Rooftops / New England TIPA / 1 x 440ml / 9.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Rooftops is our first ever canned TIPA, hopped with Chinook, Citra and Sabro! It’s scandalously juicy with ripe mango, pineapple, and zesty lime, while a tickle of coconut gives this beer a silky drinkability for such a giant lad.
One can leaves 23 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Scenes From The Lapse
items.desc:
Scenes From The Lapse / DIPA / 4 x 440ml / 8.0% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Scenes From The Lapse is a new 8% Kveik DIPA using Citra, Mosaic and Strata! An almost unnecessarily sexy hop profile of passionfruit, mango and peach is finished with that turbocharger Kveik yeast to give it near-apocalyptic drinkability.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Screwball
items.desc:
Screwball / Lemon and Lime Berliner Weisse / 4 x 440ml / 3.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
This tangy, tart lip-smacker is our latest fruited sour beer. Light in strength and sharp with snappy citrus, it’s an easy-drinking summer sour.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Soft Top
items.desc:
Soft Top / Sabro Stout / 4 x 440ml / 6.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Soft Top is the luxury smooth ride you deserve. Built to Last™ with decadent, toasty malts. Hopped for Comfort™ with Sabro brand tropical coconut goodness. Smooth vibes and electric windows as standard.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Switch Back
items.desc:
Switch Back / Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 4.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Switch Back is a light and juicy pale ale hopped with Citra, Mandarina Bavaria and Azacca. Packed with resinous and zesty fruit notes at an easy-drinking strength.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: THE BIG JUICE 6-Pack
items.desc:
THE BIG JUICE 12 x 440ml Pack
This mixed case contains our biggest, juiciest DIPAs and NEIPAs, collected for your convenience in a 6-can pack. Beers included:
2 x SCENES FROM THE LAPSE – KVEIK DIPA (CITRA MOSAIC STRATA) – 8.0% ABV
Scenes From The Lapse is a new 8% Kveik DIPA using Citra, Mosaic and Strata! An almost unnecessarily sexy hop profile of passionfruit, mango and peach is finished with that turbocharger Kveik yeast to give it near-apocalyptic drinkability.
2 x ACTION KING – DIPA (GALAXY CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
This absolute unit; this Cadillac of DIPAs; this liquid training montage is hopped with Galaxy, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe until it bursts out of its tank top. Expect mango, pineapple, pomegranate and a big whack of dankness.
2 x HOUSE IPA – NEIPA (MOSAIC MOTUEKA AMARILLO) – 6.9% ABV
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.

items.name: THE SESSION 12-Pack
items.desc:
THE SESSION 12 x 440ml Pack
This pack contains 12 cans of our latest, freshest, sessionable bangers. Beers included:
6 x SWITCH BACK – PALE ALE (CITRA MANDARINA BAVARIA AZACCA) – 4.5% ABV
A light and juicy Pale Ale hopped with Citra, Mandarina Bavaria and Azacca. Packed with resinous and zesty fruit notes at an easy-drinking strength.
6 x PULL TOGETHER – TINY PALE (CASCADE CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 2.8% ABV
Pull Together is a 2.8% Tiny Pale hopped with Cascade, Citra Cryo and Simcoe! We’ve gone even lower in ABV than Superlight for this new beer, whilst packing in the tropical hop character, juicy yet crushable texture and clean flavours.

items.name: THE TROPICAL DELUXE 12-Pack
items.desc:
THE TROPICAL DELUXE 12 x 440ml Pack / 3.8% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Tropical Deluxe is our core pale ale. Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe do the tropical dry hop tango, while the mighty London Ale III yeast strain keeps things soft, light, and as level as a hammock. Lower in alcohol, deluxer in tropical. Now in an even deluxer-er twelve pack.
One 12-pack leaves 12 can slots left in your case!
